Client.Name: Hunan Datong Lake Farm Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Hunan Datong Lake Farm Co., Ltd. is located in Datong Lake District, Yiyang City, Hunan Province. It is a modern agricultural enterprise dedicated to the development of high-tech agriculture. The company relies on the abundant water resources and fertile land resources in Datong Lake area, combined with modern agricultural technology, and is committed to building a comprehensive agricultural enterprise that integrates agricultural and sideline product planting, procurement, and sales, aquatic product procurement and sales, as well as agricultural technology promotion services.

Since its establishment, the company has always adhered to the development concept of "technology led, innovation driven", actively introduced and applied advanced technologies such as unmanned farms, precision agriculture, and intelligent agricultural machinery, and promoted the transformation and upgrading of traditional agriculture to modern agriculture. Through deep cooperation with research institutes such as South China Agricultural University and Huazhong Agricultural University, the company has successfully built an unmanned rice farm in Datong Lake District, achieving full process data collection and analysis of rice production, intelligent decision-making of agricultural instructions, and intelligent execution of agricultural machinery operations.
